body: I was using Google translate on Bonds and Ties, but man that reveal, I was half suspecting it but still felt shocked cause it felt like the story was going for a somewhat realistic route, then it turns into surprise incest Motherfucker, (literally)! Lmfao
I know I've seen "Bonds and Ties" in english, but I just can't find it.

The first story: Bonds and ties, is really good. It's about a young man get into a relationship with a middle aged colleague. They soon to reveal her past being tragically seperated from the sensei she loved and her own son. At that moment the young man would soon realize that that woman is his biological mother. Despite all of that, they still got married and gave birth to a child

Hope any could translate that work. My sypnosis is roughly unedited and unqualified. That was an extraordinary story to be honest
